is rly good
A valve classic!

Se existe um jogo que pode superar Portal, este é Portal 2. Agora o jogo abre ainda mais a historia e apresenta lugares utópicos dentro dos laboratorios. Desta vez o jogo traz um elemento a mais que é todo o suspense, beirando até mesmo a correria. Também é muito legal a forma como o jogo brinca com sua mente e faz a reviravolta, a batalha final é simplesmente épica.

Faz parte do pacote de jogos excenciais a todo gamer.

Vale 5/5 Tomb Raiders

Spoustu puzzlů, mnoho přemýšlení, Portal-gun a mnoho nástrah které potrápí váš mozek. A k tomu navíc hlášky GlaDOS a Wheatlyho které vám budou trhat bránici. Mno co říct, skvělé pokračování už tak úžasné jedničky :)

whenever i play portal 2, i reach a certain time of gameplay, then it freezes the screen! the only to stop it is by ending the task through task manager =( still prettyh fun though.. ive even tried installing and uninstalling again and again, to no avail....

Очень хорошая игра, графика просто превосходная, co-op режим самый думаю лучший (среди 2007 года)
Хочу сказать те кто сомневается "покупать игру или нет?" Мой ответ конечно "Покупайте!" Ведь у этой замечательной игры "Portal2" доступны многие возможности, такие как Мастерская Steam, простой редактор (поверьте лучше чем "Hammer Edit"",так же как я говорил в самом начале есть co-op режим.Можно поиграть с друзьями, ну или просто со случайным напарником. В тестовых камерах сообщества доступны "куча" так сказать новых карт: одиночных, кооперетивных и др.
Расскажу моё мнение о "Одиночной игре": очень отличный сюжет, оригинальная музыка, потрясная графика, хорошая озвучка персонажей, особенно в "Portal2"море шуток, также много секретных комнат и пасхалок.
Если ты, новичок, до сих пор не играешь в "Portal2"-советую тебе это стоит таких маленьких денег.
I put a portal at my feet and at the top of my head. 10/10

The game is complicated but the graphics are amazing.  I would recommend this to beginners and to people who have not played a lot of Valve games.  The game requires you to really use the critical thinking parts of your mind.  It's a nice change of pace from the tons of first person shooter games.

It's a game that gets your mind going without exploding it. It's great fun in the co-op games with a mate, and once you've completed all those, you can go onto the custom games which are made by players. There's SO many of them.

I think the multiplayer is actually better than the singleplayer in this game... or is it? You decide.
Игра просто прелесть! =) Зачёт разрабам =)

I am really liking the Beta so far. I can see minor things like minor delays(almost not noticeable) and minor graphics details. Other than that, this is the game that I love. It's so nice to be able to have games on Linux!

This game is awesome and is worth every penny!

Brilliant sequel, puzzles are much more thought provoking and the story is very nice. This one probably is worth 14.50 AUD. Still, it is so cheap on every major Steam sale. Just play it. Valve seriously are the best at narrative games.

This game is Awesome, no words can describe how fun it it. From shooting Portal guns, to blue bouncing goo, and the comedic talent of Wheatley (voiced by Stephen Merchant). I personally don't notice much of the puzzle aspect as i do with the thrill of jumping though portals, but still a great experience. 9/10 is what i would give it, not everything can be perfect but portal 2 does deliver.

I can't think of one negative thing about this.

Really nice game, especially for whoever like "paper games" like sudoku or pazzles! The main target is to reach the door. To do this you can use your portal gun to create portals, which teleport you from the one portal to the other. The are a lot of other liquids, which help you ingame. 

Not recommended for whoever likes action and adventure!

I hilgly recomend this game. It's a puzzle game and it's very fun.
It's, in my opinion, VALVe's (yes, it's VALVe, not Valve) best game. You will easily spend 4 to 6 hours in the first game playing this game. It's also very chalenging and it's the game with more content on Steam Workshop.

The co-op works perfectly! (Recomended: Play with a friend, randomly selected users usually log out during the game and you will get bored, or sometimes they have a veeeery slow PC, what makes you wait like 1 minute to play)

And the graphics are awesome, and you can have a PC with only 1GB of RAM and it will work fine.

The map maker is the only problem. And what is the problem? Limited space. That's it. Nothing else.

So I give it 97/100

I'm not usually one for puzzle games (I don't know what else to call this), but Portal 2 is ADDICTIVE! It's similar to Portal, but with a story line, including the voice of J.K. Simmons, who is awesome! I realize this is an older game and many who might see this have already played, but if you haven't tried Portal 2, do it.

Portal 2 Koop Modus: Spielspaß bis zum Umfallen!

Ich müsste lügen, würde ich sagen das der Koop-Modus nicht mindestens genauso viel Spaß bringt wie die eigentliche Hauptstory. Mit meiner Forschungspartnerin bin ich den Modus angegangen und war anfangs positiv überrascht!
Die Beiden Bots, Atlas und P-Body sind die Perfekte Besetzung für dieses Abenteuer, die Aufgaben (Ausgenommen die der Bonus Testrecken welche doch etwas kniffliger ausfallen...) waren Mittelschwer also geradewegs perfekt, zudem man nicht immernur ein waches Gehirn, sondern auch mal etwas kindliche Fantasie braucht ist es für 2 Spieler perfekt geeignet.

Ich kann mich nicht erinnern jemals in einem 2 Spieler Modus soviel Spaß gehabt zu haben... 10/10.

말이 필요없는 최고의 게임이라 평가해도 딴지 걸 사람이 없다고 생각한다.
포탈 2를 플레이 하면서 이건 좀 아쉽다라고 느낀점이 없었으며, 고유의 에피소드가 끝난 뒤에도 다른 사람이 만든 실험실을 플레이할수 있고 다른 친구와 함께 플레이 할 수 있는 협동모드는 나에게 만족을 주기에 충분했다,
우선 나는 이 게임을 스팀을 이용하는 다른유저에게 추천해 주고 싶다.
스팀을 이용하는 유저라면 꼭 해야할, 그런 게임이다.
